name: ad block for baidu
description: both for search engine and post
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("baidu.com") {
  table[width="30%"][align="right"],
  table[width="794"][height="90"],
  table[width="760"][height="90"],
  table[id="rightAd"],
  div[id="Tads"], 
  div[id="marqueebox"],
  div[id^="bdfs"],
  div[id="pma"],
  div[id="dMA"],
  div[id="cproshow"],
  body > div[style$="width: 84%;"],
  div[style*="eiv.baidu.com"],
  img[src*="eiv.baidu.com"],
  embed[src*="eiv.baidu.com"],
  table[id="0"] + *,
  table[bgcolor="#f5f5f5"],
  table[bgcolor="#f5f5f5"] + *,
  a[href*="/ma/rcv/click.php?"],
  a[href*="/ma/rcv/click.php?"] ~ *,
  a[href*="/baidu.php?"],
  a[href*="/baidu.php?"] ~ *{
    display:none!important;
  }
}
